text: Boris Eliozovich Chochiev (Russian: Борис Елиозович Чочиев; ; 1 November 1957 – 22 July 2021) was a South Ossetian politician. He was the acting Prime Minister of South Ossetia in 2008. He became Prime Minister on 18 August 2008, after South Ossetian President Eduard Kokoity had fired the former government. Chochiev died on 22 July 2021 in Vladikavkaz, Russia from COVID-19 at the age of 63. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of South Ossetia Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Russia
title: Boris Chochiev
